014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.statement.internal;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Method;
017
018import org.jdbi.v3.core.Handle;
019import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
020import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
021import org.jdbi.v3.core.result.ResultIterable;
022import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.Query;
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
024import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.statement.UseRowMapper;
025import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.statement.UseRowReducer;
026
027public class SqlQueryHandler extends CustomizingStatementHandler<Query> {
028    private final ResultReturner magic;
029
030    public SqlQueryHandler(Class<?> sqlObjectType, Method method) {
031        super(sqlObjectType, method);
032        this.magic = ResultReturner.forMethod(sqlObjectType, method);
033    }
034
035    @Override
036    public void warm(ConfigRegistry config) {
037        super.warm(config);
038        magic.warm(config);
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    void configureReturner(Query q, SqlObjectStatementConfiguration cfg) {
043        UseRowMapper useRowMapper = getMethod().getAnnotation(UseRowMapper.class);
044        UseRowReducer useRowReducer = getMethod().getAnnotation(UseRowReducer.class);
045
046        if (useRowReducer != null && useRowMapper != null) {
047            throw new IllegalStateException("Cannot declare @UseRowMapper and @UseRowReducer on the same method.");
048        }
049
050        cfg.setReturner(() -> {
051            StatementContext ctx = q.getContext();
052            QualifiedType<?> elementType = magic.elementType(ctx.getConfig());
053
054            if (useRowReducer != null) {
055                return magic.reducedResult(q.reduceRows(rowReducerFor(useRowReducer)), ctx);
056            }
057
058            ResultIterable<?> iterable = useRowMapper == null
059                    ? q.mapTo(elementType)
060                    : q.map(rowMapperFor(useRowMapper));
061            return magic.mappedResult(iterable, ctx);
062        });
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    Query createStatement(Handle handle, String locatedSql) {
067        return handle.createQuery(locatedSql);
068    }
069}
